text: Koly pryznachenyy chas dlya yoho smerti prybuv, vony ne maly klyucha shcho vin vmer. Ne do odniyeyi z tvaryn postaravsya z'yisty yoho personal, ta vin vypav, jinns zdiysnyv shcho vin buv mertvyy. Vony takym chynom zdiysnyly, kotryy yakshcho b vony diysno znaly unseen, vony zupynyatʹsya robochi takym chynom tyazhkyy yak tilʹky vin vmer
